author:
By Jackie Burrell

jburrell@bayareanewsgroup.com
title: Travel Top 10: Most gorgeous sunsets
text:
Travel Top 10: Most gorgeous sunsets By Jackie Burrell Posted: 07/29/2015 03:00:00 PM PDT Sunset in Honolulu, Oahu, Hawaii (Thinkstock) Gorgeous sunsets With a nod to the season's glorious balmy nights, National Geographic Travel has ranked the planet's 10 top summer sunsets. We always have quibbles with these lists. Clearly, they've never watched the fiery sunsets from Treasure Island or Berkeley's Grizzly Peak. Sheesh. But we suppose twilight is pretty in Santorini, Honolulu (pictured) and -- heavy sigh -- Bora Bora, too. Here's the list: 
1. Halekulani Resort, Honolulu, Hawaii 
2. Antelope Island State Park, Syracuse, Utah 
3. New York Harbor, New York 
4. Key West, Florida 
5. Torres del Paine National Park, Chile 
6. Oia Castle, Santorini, Greece 
7. Clifton Beaches, Cape Town, South Africa 
8. Kenting National Park, Hengchun Peninsula, Taiwan 
9. Vairou Bay, Bora Bora, Tahiti 
10. Uluru (Ayers Rock), Northern Territory, Australia -- Jackie Burrell, Staff
